scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.start:server: export $(cat .env | xargs) && cd server && npm run start
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:server && npm run generate:client
scripts.test:all: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
